abstract: Dish Network made an unsolicited bid on Tuesday for the wireless network operator Clearwire, trumping an offer by Clearwire’s majority shareholder, Sprint Nextel.
snippet: Dish Network made an unsolicited bid on Tuesday for the wireless network operator Clearwire, trumping an offer by Clearwire’s majority shareholder, Sprint Nextel.
lead_paragraph: 8:08 p.m. | Updated Not so fast, Sprint.

headline.main: Dish Network Makes Bid for Clearwire, Topping Sprint Offer
headline.print_headline: Dish Network Tops Sprint In a Bid to Buy Clearwire
